data.name: TaskCreateBodyDescription
data.value: Please fill the body of task with data: message, photos, sounds and press "Next" button or enter /next command. To cancel operation please press "Cancel" button or use /cancel command. First text message will be used as a name for the task and should have length of 50 characters max.

data.name: TaskSetDateDescription
data.value: Pick a date for your task either with calendar buttons or via text message of "YYYY.MM.DD" format.

data.name: TaskSetTimeDescription
data.value: Now pick a time either with time picker or via text message of "HH.MM" 24 hrs format.

data.name: TaskSetConcurrencyPeriodDescription
data.value: Now pick or skip recurrency period either via recurrency time picker or in "HH.MM" 24 hrs format. To skip either press "Skip" button or enter "/skip" command.
